1.name: mBoggle 2.0 (Ikan Oh Ikan)
1.description: We developed a new Malay word game to replace the existing one in the annual HCI Malay Boggle (mBoggle) competition. Players control a fish that pops alphabet bubbles to spell out Malay words. This is a fun and interactive way to engage MSP students, improve their Malay vocabulary, and promote greater interest in the Malay language. The mBoggle competition attracts about 200 MSP students from different schools in Singapore. From 2019 onwards, Ikan oh Ikan will be the game used in the competition. <e>*** the link works only on the school network</e>

2.name: 情牵华岗
2.description: 情牵华岗 is a website created for the Hwa Chong 100th Anniversary Heritage Tour, held on 9 March 2019. Using location services, it detects, highlights, and gives a brief introduction on Hwa Chong landmarks that are in close proximity to the visitor. It also acts as a guestbook that allows visitors to pen down messages as a record of the visit.

3.name: tours.hci.edu.sg
3.description: a completely revamped version of 情牵华岗. we got feedback after the 100th anniversary heritage trail that school management liked the website and wanted to expand it for future use to cover ALL tours, including SOO, teachers induction, JC orientaiton, HSC investiture, etc... The old interface has been preserved but is now a subpage of the new website. The new website's landing page shows ALL tours instead of landmarks. There is also a new Maps interface.

8.name: polygon maker
8.description: first ever webgl project. allows you to do xyz translation and define 4 vertices of a polygon.

9.name: gradient generator
9.description: second webgl project. allows you to define rgba() values for 4 vertices of a square and blends the colours naturally. useful for creating colour wallpapers.

10.name: spinning cube
10.description: third webgl project. renders a 3D rotating cube.

1.name: clock newtab
1.description: first time making a Chrome extension. overrides the default home page to a minimalist B&W clock.

2.name: sleep controller
2.description: second time making a chrome extension. when it is time to get off the computer, the extension alerts() and upon confirmation, closes Chrome
